Question
========
  
A study uses scores on three variables: 1) years of education received, 2) income, and 3) longevity. The researcher wants to estimate the effect of variable 1 on 3 holding variable 2 constant. Which analysis technique is applicable here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Ancova.
* Anova.
* Logistic regression.
* Multiple regression.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
